member_organisations: We have about 800 members - local governments/communities from total of 898 in Moldova
fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, International co-operation and development, Enlargement, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, External Relations
eu_initiatives:
Main directions 
1. role and place of local governments in society and development 
2. Development, enlargement and neighborhood policies  
3. EU funds and programs for local governments 
 
Main EU institutions 
1. European Parliament 
2. European Commission 
3. EU Committee of Regions
organisation_name: Congress of Local Authorities from Moldova (CALM)
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Other public or mixed entities, created by law whose purpose is to act in the public interest
membership:
Council of European Municipalities and Regions (CEMR) 
United Cities and Local Governments (UCLG) 
European Association for Local Democracy (ALDA) 
Network of Local Governments Associations from South-east Europe (NALAS)
goals__remit:
Association of local governments from Moldova 
Objectives 
- promotion and advocacy of local autonomy and local democracy both at the national and international level 
- local democracy, local government and decentralization oriented national policies 
- national and international funds and programs for local governments
relevant_communication: Comprehensive process-based advocacy, promotion and communication including via our main European partners - EU Committee of Regions, Congress of Local and Regional Authorities of the Council of Europe, Council of European Municipalities and Regions (CEMR)
